description: (Part 4 of 5)Kody finds a new love in being naked in front of the camera and I find a new love in him. This 18 year old soldier is pure All-American boy with his high school wrestling, football and baseball playing background. He describes to me his love for baseball and how he almost played for NCSU, but decided to join the Army instead. He's a very sweet young man and full of humor, but the most striking thing about Kody is how he turns on the heat when the camera is aimed at him. He has a natural way of seducing you with his eyes and body and the way he moves slowly and intently, giving his all to get the viewer interested and off.Kody is fond of telling me how he appreciates how I operate in 'steps'. I asked him what he meant by this and he explained that I take my time and take things slow, never rushing or being pushy. He tells me that if it were not for my 'steps' method that he would have never even considered getting naked for the camera. I guess in spending so much quality time with these guys sometimes I fail to realize just how much I put into it all and just how much time goes into really trying to make them comfortable. Hell, I am enjoying myself so much along the way and getting to know them better is so fascinating for me that I hardly realize the amount of time that goes into cultivating the relationships. Luckily for me (and you) these 'steps' help me get these young men comfortable enough to share themselves with us.(Continued in Kody: An American Soldier 2 (5)]
